situation.title: Penalties for not wearing a face masks
situation.meta_description: Penalties for breaching the general obligation to wear a face mask

content.processed:
Regulations

The Emergency Measures of the Ministry of Health states a general obligation to wear a face mask. This is monitored by municipal and also by state police forces. You can get a penalty up to 10,000 CZK if you fail to comply, however, the police can give you only a warning in case of a less major offence. The penalty is payable immediately, or later on during an administrative procedure.

If you fail to comply with a quarantine or a self-isolation, it can be treated as a criminal offence of spreading a contagious illness.

Source

Police jurisdiction to monitor the public of wearing face masks is stated by a Special Law. Penalties are stated by the Act No. 258/2000 Coll., on the protection of public health (ยง 92n, paragraph 1b of this Act), and by the Act No. 250/2016 Coll.,on the liability for offences and proceedings concerning them (ยง 91 of this Act).
